main event: A family observed a luminous disc-shaped UFO hovering for 50 minutes over a wooded area in Bridgeport, California.
interesting points: The family saw the object at approximately 9:15 P.M. and estimated it to be 50 to 75 feet in diameter., The object was brilliant white in color and remained stationary until it swiftly dashed into the distance., They observed it from about 3 to 4 miles away, approximately 15 degrees above the horizon., The object emitted no sound and left no trail., The observation was made by the entire family including children ages 8, 10, and 12.
